languages.text: {n}Рука дознавателя ледяная и неподатливая — и все же вы чувствуете, как в ответ на ваше прикосновение он едва заметно пожимает ваши пальцы. Медленно, словно через силу, Хейнрикс поворачивает к вам голову и поднимает на вас взгляд — в котором появляется тень узнавания.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Рука дознавателя ледяная и неподатливая — и все же вы чувствуете, как в ответ на ваше прикосновение он едва заметно пожимает ваши пальцы. Медленно, словно через силу, Хейнрикс поворачивает к вам голову и поднимает на вас взгляд — в котором появляется тень узнавания.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix's hand is icy and stiff — and yet you feel the barest squeeze of his fingers around yours in response. Slowly, seemingly with great effort, Heinrix turns his head and lifts his eyes to yours. You see a shadow of recognition in that gaze.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Рука дознавателя ледяная и неподатливая — и все же вы чувствуете, как в ответ на ваше прикосновение он едва заметно пожимает ваши пальцы. Медленно, словно через силу, Хейнрикс поворачивает к вам голову и поднимает на вас взгляд — в котором появляется тень узнавания.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix's hand is icy and stiff — and yet you feel the barest squeeze of his fingers around yours in response. Slowly, seemingly with great effort, Heinrix turns his head and lifts his eyes to yours. You see a shadow of recognition in that gaze.{/n}

{n}Heinrix's hand is icy and stiff — and yet you feel the barest squeeze of his fingers around yours in response. Slowly, seemingly with great effort, Heinrix turns his head and lifts his eyes to yours. You see a shadow of recognition in that gaze.{/n}

{n}Heinrix's hand is icy and stiff — and yet you feel the barest squeeze of his fingers around yours in response. Slowly, seemingly with great effort, Heinrix turns his head and lifts his eyes to yours. You see a shadow of recognition in that gaze.{/n}

languages.text: {n}海因里希的手冰冷而僵硬，但你却感觉到他的手指紧紧地抓着你的手指。海因里希慢慢转过了头，睁开眼睛，看着你，似乎费了很大力气。从他的眼神中，你感觉到他似乎认出了你。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's hand is icy and stiff — and yet you feel the barest squeeze of his fingers around yours in response. Slowly, seemingly with great effort, Heinrix turns his head and lifts his eyes to yours. You see a shadow of recognition in that gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希的手冰冷而僵硬，但你却感觉到他的手指紧紧地抓着你的手指。海因里希慢慢转过了头，睁开眼睛，看着你，似乎费了很大力气。从他的眼神中，你感觉到他似乎认出了你。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La mano de Heinrix es fría y rígida, pero sientes que sus dedos se estrechan de forma casi imperceptible. Lentamente y con gran esfuerzo, Heinrix gira la cabeza para mirarte a los ojos. Ves que te reconoce.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's hand is icy and stiff — and yet you feel the barest squeeze of his fingers around yours in response. Slowly, seemingly with great effort, Heinrix turns his head and lifts his eyes to yours. You see a shadow of recognition in that gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La mano de Heinrix es fría y rígida, pero sientes que sus dedos se estrechan de forma casi imperceptible. Lentamente y con gran esfuerzo, Heinrix gira la cabeza para mirarte a los ojos. Ves que te reconoce.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスの手は氷のように硬かった。それでもなお、あなたは彼の指があなたの指に触れるのを感じた。ハインリックスは、ゆっくりと、努力の末に、顔を向け、あなたの方に目を上げた。その視線に、あなたは認識の影を見る。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's hand is icy and stiff — and yet you feel the barest squeeze of his fingers around yours in response. Slowly, seemingly with great effort, Heinrix turns his head and lifts his eyes to yours. You see a shadow of recognition in that gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスの手は氷のように硬かった。それでもなお、あなたは彼の指があなたの指に触れるのを感じた。ハインリックスは、ゆっくりと、努力の末に、顔を向け、あなたの方に目を上げた。その視線に、あなたは認識の影を見る。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La main glacée d'Heinrix est toute raide, mais vous le sentez exercer une légère pression contre vos doigts. Lentement, à grand-peine, il tourne la tête et lève les yeux vers vous. Vous plongez votre regard dans le sien et voyez qu'il semble vous reconnaître.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's hand is icy and stiff — and yet you feel the barest squeeze of his fingers around yours in response. Slowly, seemingly with great effort, Heinrix turns his head and lifts his eyes to yours. You see a shadow of recognition in that gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La main glacée d'Heinrix est toute raide, mais vous le sentez exercer une légère pression contre vos doigts. Lentement, à grand-peine, il tourne la tête et lève les yeux vers vous. Vous plongez votre regard dans le sien et voyez qu'il semble vous reconnaître.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix' Hand fühlt sich eisig und steif an – du spürst aber, wie er deine Finger ganz leicht zusammenpresst. Langsam und mit größter Anstrengung dreht Heinrix seinen Kopf zu dir und schaut zu dir auf. In seinem Blick erkennst du einen Hauch von Leben.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's hand is icy and stiff — and yet you feel the barest squeeze of his fingers around yours in response. Slowly, seemingly with great effort, Heinrix turns his head and lifts his eyes to yours. You see a shadow of recognition in that gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix' Hand fühlt sich eisig und steif an – du spürst aber, wie er deine Finger ganz leicht zusammenpresst. Langsam und mit größter Anstrengung dreht Heinrix seinen Kopf zu dir und schaut zu dir auf. In seinem Blick erkennst du einen Hauch von Leben.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix'in eli, buz kesip kaskatı olmuş. Yine de tepki olarak parmaklarıyla parmaklarını hafifçe sıktığını hissediyorsun. Yavaşça ve görünüşe göre büyük bir çabayla Heinrix, başını çevirip gözlerini gözlerine dikiyor. O bakışta bir nebze farkındalık seçiyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix's hand is icy and stiff — and yet you feel the barest squeeze of his fingers around yours in response. Slowly, seemingly with great effort, Heinrix turns his head and lifts his eyes to yours. You see a shadow of recognition in that gaze.{/n}
